strIntroduction: Sukko treatments are based on the ancient Thai medical theory. Traditional massages, heat therapies and authentic herbs are used to bring the physical conditions and spirit back to a state of balance. Herbal recipes and procedures handed down through generations ensure Sukko spa cares are free of petrochemicals, synthetic perfumes or colors, complement the spa's concept and suit individual needs and preferences.
